title: Porcine Coronavirus
text:
Ongoing projects

Project 1- Construction of infectious clone porcine delta coronavirus
First the plasmid pUC19 + Amprocillin was transformed in to E. coli and incubated for 12 hours at 37 degree celsius.


Project 2- Electroporation in Vero cells
Vero cells were then electroporated with the full length genomic DNA and N gene segment. These electroporated cells were then incubated.
